intro: Here's a short overview of who I am.
intro_1: Hi, I'm Elisabeth, 22 years old, and currently studying Media Informatics in my fifth semester.
intro_2: I'm passionate about combining technology and creativity — not just making things work, but designing them in a meaningful and thoughtful way. When I work on a project, I give it my full commitment. I quickly familiarize myself with new topics, take on responsibility, and see larger challenges as motivation rather than something intimidating.
intro_3: It's important to me to continuously grow both professionally and personally. I enjoy working in a team, supporting others whenever I can, and I value honest feedback.
intro_4: Outside of my studies, I'm involved in many creative activities — from model building and drawing to gaming. For me, experimenting and learning new things is simply part of who I am.
intro_5: I'm looking for a company where I can contribute long-term, take on responsibility, and grow together as part of a team.
